pr_title: Fix #5939 by creating a mutable list in OpenDatabaseAction

timeline.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: Yeah I actually first had it like this but I changed it because IntelliJ was complaining to use Collections.singletonList instead of Arrays.asList. Changed it now to reflect your suggestion 👍
replies.author: Ka0o0

replies.bodyText: Yeah, but seems like Intelilj didn't know that you need a mutable list later on.
replies.author: Siedlerchr

timeline.message: Fix #5939 by creating a mutable list in OpenDatabaseAction
Fix #5939 by creating a mutable list in OpenDatabaseAction
